title: Sources: Hawks, Young working together on trade
content: Atlanta Hawks four-time All-Star Trae Young and his agent, Aaron Mintz, are working with the franchise on a trade, sources told ESPN.

title: Tua: Getting a fresh start in '26 'would be dope'
content: Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa is open to a "fresh start," he told reporters Monday, after he was benched for the team's final three games of the season.

title: Day after Huskers pledge, QB Minchey flips to UK
content: One day after announcing his commitment to Nebraska, transfer quarterback Kenny Minchey, the former Notre Dame backup, has flipped to Kentucky, he told ESPN on Monday.

title: Ravens sing Lamar's praises as season falls flat
content: Quarterback Lamar Jackson has the support of his teammates after an injury-marred season that saw the Ravens miss the playoffs for the first time since 2021.

title: Michigan QB Underwood to return as sophomore
content: Michigan starting quarterback Bryce Underwood will return for his sophomore season with the Wolverines, giving new coach Kyle Whittingham an offensive centerpiece to build around in 2026.

title: UGA star WR Branch, LB Allen entering NFL draft
content: Georgia will have to replace its leading pass catcher and tackler in 2026 after wide receiver Zachariah Branch and linebacker CJ Allen both announced Monday that they're entering the 2026 NFL draft.

title: Dolan says Knicks can win Finals as constructed
content: New York Knicks owner James Dolan said he expects his team to be able to reach the NBA Finals as currently constructed.

title: Rangers' Shesterkin exits 3-2 loss with leg injury
content: New York Rangers goaltender Igor Shesterkin, 30, the 2022 Vezina Trophy winner and face of the franchise, left his team's 3-2 overtime loss to the Utah Mammoth on Monday night midway through the first period with what the team labeled a lower-body injury.

title: ✍ 2026 NFL draft order: First 18 slots are set
content: The Raiders, Jets and Cardinals hold the top three picks in the 2026 NFL draft. See the rest of the order -- plus each team's top need -- after the regular season.

title: Barnwell makes his NFL award picks: Ranking candidates for MVP, Rookie of the Year, more
content: Drake Maye or Matthew Stafford for MVP? Which rookies should earn hardware? And no one is beating out Myles Garrett for DPOY, right?

title: The NFL playoffs are here! Our guide to all 14 teams, from favorites to underdogs
content: The 2025 NFL playoff field is set, and an exciting wild-card round looms. Here's everything to know about the 14 teams vying to win Super Bowl LX.

title: Browns in full reset mode: Here's what we know after ouster of Kevin Stefanski
content: In search of a new coach, Cleveland enters an offseason with first-round picks and unsettled questions at QB.

title: MVP, ROY, All-NBA teams and more: Predictions for all the league's highest honors
content: ESPN analyst Kevin Pelton projects the favorites to win each award and make the All-NBA teams, as well as other contenders and long shots.

title: Man United must go big and hire a superstar manager after firing Ruben Amorim
content: It is time for one of the most powerful clubs in the world to hire a manager with the experience, track record, credentials and personality befitting Man United's status.

title: 'Fragile' no more: How the Bears' Caleb Williams, Ben Johnson evolved
content: Caleb Williams thought Ben Johnson didn't like him at one point, but the duo evolved to lead the playoff-bound Bears.

title: SC Next Top 25: The best high school boys' basketball teams in 2025-26
content: Link Academy (Miss.) takes the No. 1 spot to start the calendar year, with Spire Academy (Ohio) making the biggest jump to No. 2 in January.

title: SC Next Top 25: The best high school girls' basketball teams in 2025-26
content: Ontario Christian (Calif.) stays atop the 2025-26 SC Next girls' high school rankings as the showcase of the month is the Hoophall Classic.

title: Men's AP Top 25 poll reaction: Michigan State, Kansas stumble
content: Nebraska cracks the top 10. SMU and UCF replace Florida and USC. See more changes after the two-week hiatus.

title: CFP semifinals first look: Previewing the penultimate round
content: How each team can win its semifinal game, plus key players and what we learned from the quarterfinals.

title: NHL's best this week: Who wins a series between U.S.-Canada Olympic B-teams?
content: Many superstars were left off the rosters. Here's how two teams of snubs look -- and who would win a seven-game series.

title: Pro wrestling awards 2025: Dominik Mysterio, Stephanie Vaquer and an AEW resurgence
content: Pro wrestling insiders identify their top stars and biggest moments of 2025 in WWE, AEW and other top promotions.

title: VAR review: Why was Wirtz onside in Premier League, offside in Europe?
content: Liverpool had a goal from Florian Wirtz ruled out vs. Fulham, but it was overturned by VAR on the slimmest of margins. Why?

title: VAR doesn't interfere with second yellow cards. But should it?
content: Despite some major incidents lately, VAR is unable to get involved in second yellow cards. Here's why.

title: NLL Week 6 highlights: Rush, Bandits back on top of the standings
content: Are Saskatchewan and Buffalo headed to a championship-round rematch? Here's what went down in Week 6.

title: Fantasy football year in review: MVP, biggest bust and season highlights
content: A summary of the best fantasy performances, biggest storylines, surprises and disappointments, along with the usual dose of historical perspective.

title: Mike Clay's early 2026 fantasy football PPR rankings
content: A look at the position-by-position rankings for the 2026 fantasy season, updated throughout the offseason.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Juventus eye Chiesa, Sørloth
content: Juventus are looking to boost their forward line by looking at deals for Liverpool's Federico Chiesa and Atlético Madrid's Alexander Sørloth. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Make these fights, UFC: Makhachev-Topuria, Jones-Pereira and more
content: From superfights to title rematches to downright epics, these 10 matchups need to be booked this year.

title: Suresh Kalmadi, former Union Minister and Congress leader, passes away at 81
content: Suresh Kalmadi had served as Union Minister of State for Railways and was a former president of the Indian Olympic Association (IOA)

title: Indore water contamination: 38 new diarrhoea cases detected, 110 in hospital; death toll 7
content: Six patients have been referred for treatment, and 110 are currently undergoing treatment in hospitals, including 15 in ICUs, officials said

title: Various parts of T.N. to get light to heavy rain from January 7
content: Six districts, including Ramanathapuram and Mayiladuthurai, may experience heavy rain on Friday, and districts such as Cuddalore, Thanjavur, and Villupuram may record intense rainfall on Saturday

title: India launches new e-Business visa for Chinese nationals
content: The new e-Production Investment Business Visa will be issued in about 45 to 50 days after applying, with permission to stay in India for up to six months

title: Two Indians among 6 killed in jeep mishap in Nepal
content: The Indian nationals, hailing from Bihar, were identified as Rajnish Kumar, 42, and Aravind Kumar, 50

title: NGT directs to issue notice to Centre, U.P. govt. on ‘violations’ near Taj Mahal
content: According to the applicant, as per the Supreme Court, any tree felling within a 5 km aerial distance from the Taj Mahal requires prior permission of the top court, irrespective of the number of trees involved

title: AAP govt. faces heat over Punjab’s law and order; Minister holds previous regimes accountable for gangsters ‘having free run’
content: This comes a day after AAP leader and village sarpanch Jharmal Singh was allegedly shot dead at a wedding venue in Amritsar

title: Kavitha sets sights on Siddipet in new political offensive
content: Siddipet constituency has been the stronghold of Mr. Chandrashekhar Rao as he was MLA for five times from 1985 before he resigned in 2004 after winning it

title: Madras High Court stays tender process for widening ECR and constructing an elevated corridor
content: Justice P.T. Asha grants the interim relief till January 27 pursuant to a case filed by an unsuccesful bidder alleging favouritism in grant of contract

title: Union Home Minister Amit Shah participates in Pongal celebration in Tiruchi
content: Earlier in the day, he worshipped at the Sri Jambukeswarar Akilandeswari Temple at Tiruvanaikoil in Tiruchi and the Sri Ranaganathaswamy Temple in Srirangam

title: Chief Minister M.K. Stalin signs MoU with UN Women on inclusive development
content: The Memorandum of Understanding aims to strengthen institutional capacities for gender-responsive governance

title: Congress MP stands firm on demand for sharing power in Tamil Nadu after Assembly poll
content: Virudhunagar MP B. Manickam Tagore says poll prediction by private organisation states no party, including the DMK, can win on the upcoming election on its own

title: SC refuses to hear plea against Prime Minister offering of chadar at Ajmer Sharif Dargah
content: A Bench of Chief Justice Surya Kant and Justice Joymalya Bagchi says the issue is not justiciable and asked the petitioner to seek appropriate relief in the civil suit, which was pending in the trial court on the claim that the dargah was built over the ruins of a Shiva temple

title: Bihar BJP leaders pay rich tribute to late Sushil Kumar Modi on his birth anniversary
content: Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar unveiled his life-size statue in Patna while Deputy Chief Minister Samrat Choudhary asserted that in his long political career, Sushil Modi prioritised the fight against corruption, good governance, and development

title: Thirupparankundram issue: Madras High Court to pronounce judgment on T.N.’s appeals on January 6
content: The judges say the issue regarding the restriction imposed on the total number of participants for the Santhanakoodu Urus festival on the hill to 50 will also be discussed in the verdict

title: Haryana CM Saini blames Congress, INDIA bloc for spreading false info about VB-G RAM G scheme
content: The Chief Minister said that MGNREGA, launched nearly two decades ago, was conceived in a different economic and social context.

title: Former Union Minister’s son booked in hit-and-run case in Chhattisgarh; victim critical
content: A police officer confirmed that the accused Balwant Singh alias Lucky, son of BJP MLA Renuka Singh, has been booked for rash and negligent driving and endangering human life

title: DMK government has compromised women’s safety, says Edappadi K. Palaniswami
content: Claiming that use of narcotics was rampant in the State, he alleges that the primary reason behind the offences against women and children is the free movement of drugs

title: West Bengal CM Mamata lays foundation stone of 5-km bridge connecting Sagar Island to mainland
content: Estimated to cost ₹1,670 crore, the four-lane bridge will connect Lot 8 in Kakdwip to Kachuberia on Sagar Island.

title: Students should help take development of the State forward, says Tamil Nadu Chief Minister
content: Stalin says while people-centric schemes have catapulted the State to double-digit growth, there is scope for more development. He launches the distribution of free laptops to college students

title: BJP welcomes Supreme Court decision rejecting bail pleas of Umar Khalid, Sharjeel Imam
content: At a press conference, BJP spokesperson Shehzad Poonawalla asked if the Congress, Samajwadi Party, Trinamool Congress, and the Aam Aadmi Party would apologise to the families whose members were killed in the riots

title: What does the SHANTI Bill change? | Explained
content: How open is India’s nuclear sector now? What role will private firms play? What powers does the AERB now have? How self-reliant is India’s nuclear programme? How has nuclear liability changed? Why is the Opposition opposing SHANTI?

title: Congress expresses ‘grave concern’ over ‘unilateral U.S. actions’ in Venezuela
content: Any kinetic action without UN sanction can result in resurgence in ‘primordial rules of statecraft’, the party says

title: Bank in Kochi receives hoax bomb threat
content: The threat messages reportedly claimed that ammonium nitrate had been planted at multiple locations inside the bank

title: Congress targets Centre over Trump’s tariff threat
content: Public displays of bonhomie between PM and the American leader had yielded little diplomatic dividend, says Opposition party

title: 31.8% of Aravalli Range at risk after recent classification, says conservation group
content: The group demanded that the entire Aravalli range be declared a “fully protected zone” with the abolition of any kind of distinction between “hills” and “mountains” based on height

title: Applications invited for admissions to UG programmes including engineering and medical courses
content: Apply for admission to engineering, architecture, pharmacy, medical and medical allied courses in Kerala

title: Gujarat government suspends IAS officer arrested by ED in graft case
content: According to the ED, Mr. Patel allegedly fixed bribe rates ranging between ₹5 and ₹10 per square metre for granting approvals for change of land use

title: Four children wounded by burning painting material in Odisha school
content: Four students sustained burn injuries. Three are out of danger, while one student is undergoing treatment

title: KSRTC plans induction of 644 new buses to strengthen rural services
content: According to officials, the proposed fleet expansion will include 500 regular buses and 144 double-door mofussil buses, with a majority of these vehicles earmarked for rural routes.

title: Kidwai Memorial Institute of Oncology gets ISO 14001:2015 certification for solid waste management
content: The State-run tertiary care cancer institute is one of the few hospitals in the country that are recognised for compliance with international environmental standards

title: BJP alleges govt. allotting flats to illegal Bangladeshi immigrants; Cong. hits back
content: The BJP leaders tried to reach the Kogilu demolition site in buses to hold a protest on Monday, but were stopped by the police. The protest was held in Bagalur

title: TTD to revamp Kalyana Mandapams, digitise sacred jewellery records
content: Executive Officer orders a comprehensive status report on Kalyana Mandapams and calls for upgrades to the Facility Management System app, including QR code access, to enhance the devotee experience.

title: First Gram Sabha of Markapuram district held at Tippayapalem
content: Prakasam Collector calls upon residents to participate in the development of the district by maintaining proper personal hygiene and environmental cleanliness

title: Odisha doctors boycott OPD for two hours to demand Central pay scale
content: Over 6,000 doctors at 32 hospitals in district headquarters, 300 community health centres and other primary health centres are taking part in the strike

title: Andhra Pradesh to set up Project Monitoring Units in 46 cities to enhance urban sanitation
content: Dedicated units will provide real-time monitoring, data validation and technical support to Urban Local Bodies under Swachh Bharat Mission (Urban) 2.0, marking a shift from periodic assessments to continuous sanitation performance management

title: Supreme Court grants relief to Adani Power, sets aside customs duty on SEZ electricity
content: “In our view, the High Court, in its judgment of 2019, fell into error in accepting the submission of the Union that the later notifications continued to operate merely because they were not specifically set aside in the decision of 2015, the Supreme Court bench said

title: Bhu Suraksha project launched to digitise land records
content: Karnataka has an estimated 100 crore pages of land records, of which around 62 crore pages have already been scanned

title: Ratha Sapthami at Tiruchanur temple on January 25
content: Devotees get rare opportunity to witness the Goddess on seven celestial vahanams in a single day procession

title: Congress to finalise candidates for Kerala Assembly polls soon
content: The proposals of the District Congress Committees alone will be considered for party nominees in the Assembly polls, as per an action plan conceived at the State leadership camp that concluded on Monday

title: Dharwad tops State in guarantee schemes implementation
content: According to State Guarantee Schemes Implementation Authority Chairman H.M. Revanna, the district has achieved 98% of the target

title: Officials told to take strict measures to curb supply and sale of Chinese manja
content: Efforts are also being made to seek support from the film industry for awareness campaigns, Principal Chief Conservator of Forests C. Suvarna said

title: Fisheries varsity seems to have no time to pursue criminal case on illegal admission of over 40 students, says HC
content: Justice D. Bharatha Chakravarthy quashes unilateral demand of a higher fees of ₹6 lakh made by the university on one of the students who pleaded that she did not commit any wrong

title: Police in States step up social media monitoring
content: Dedicated cells rise from 262 in 2020 to 365 in 2024; numbers high in Bihar (52), Maharashtra (50), Punjab (48), West Bengal (38) and Assam (37); officials cite evolving crime trends for rise in cells

title: Doctors oppose changes to Telangana Medical Council, warn of State-wide protests against G.O. 229
content: Representatives of several doctors’ bodies objected to the ‘backdoor entry’ of non-doctors and bureaucrats, including IAS officers, into a professional regulatory body that requires clinical accountability

title: Former Union minister Suresh Kalmadi passes away at 81; funeral today in Pune
content: Veteran politician and former Union minister Suresh Kalmadi has passed away in Pune after a prolonged illness. Known for his extensive involvement in sports administration, including his tenure as IOA president, Kalmadi's career was marked by both significant contributions and controversy surrounding the 2010 Commonwealth Games. His mortal remains will be available for public viewing before cremation.

title: Mustafizur snub fallout: Bangladesh await ICC call on WC venues
content: Bangladesh Cricket Board has formally requested the ICC to relocate their T20 World Cup matches from India, citing security concerns following the IPL squad release of Mustafizur Rahman. BCB president Aminul Islam emphasized that their next steps depend entirely on the ICC's response, clarifying this is an ICC event, not a bilateral matter.

title: 'I am a decent man': Venezuela's Maduro pleads not guilty in US court
content: Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro pleaded not guilty to all charges in a US courtroom, asserting his continued leadership. Captured at his Caracas home, Maduro appeared in prison attire, shackled, and with translation headphones. His defense attorney confirmed the not guilty plea. Further court proceedings are anticipated soon.

title: Toxic smog: Delhi remains in ‘poor’ category as AQI hits 288
content: Delhi's air quality remains poor with an AQI of 288, causing smog and reduced visibility across the city. Despite the conditions, flight operations at Indira Gandhi International Airport continue under CAT III, though delays are possible. Prevailing winter conditions and low wind speeds are contributing to the pollution.

title: When Mark Zuckerberg shared his basic hiring rule at Meta, with tip for college students
content: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg revealed his cardinal hiring rule: he'd only hire someone he could hypothetically work for. This philosophy, stemming from his Harvard days and the founding of Facebook, emphasizes personal connections and shared values over pure objectives.

title: 'If US attacks another Nato country … ': Denmark PM's warning after Trump's Greenland remarks
content: Denmark's Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen firmly rejected President Trump's renewed claims that the US "needs" Greenland for security reasons, calling his assertions "unacceptable." She emphasized that both Denmark and Greenland have repeatedly ruled out any sale or annexation, and warned that any US attack on a NATO member would halt all cooperation.

title: 'Shubman was left out because ... ': Harbhajan explains T20 World Cup omission
content: Harbhajan Singh backs Shubman Gill's appointment as ODI captain, believing he is ready for big challenges and future leadership. He also feels Gill will get more T20 opportunities despite his World Cup omission. Harbhajan praised the T20 World Cup squad as a "10/10 team" and highlighted the strength of India's spin attack.

title: AI debate: Mathematician Joel Hamkins warns; ‘LLMs give wrong answers’
content: Renowned mathematician Joel David Hamkins has voiced strong doubts about large language models' utility in mathematical research, calling their outputs "garbage" and "not mathematically correct." He highlights AI's frustrating tendency to confidently assert incorrectness and resist correction, mirroring unproductive human interactions. Despite AI's benchmark successes, Hamkins finds current systems unreliable for genuine research collaboration.

title: Delhi family attacked, son stripped on Delhi street over gym feud
content: A dispute over a gym operating from a residential property in east Delhi's Laxmi Nagar allegedly led to a violent assault. A man was beaten, his wife molested, and their son stripped and assaulted on the street. CCTV footage captured the incident, and the caretaker has been arrested.

title: OpenAI IPO plans: Sam Altman says he has no interest in public company CEO role
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has expressed zero enthusiasm for leading a public company, despite acknowledging an IPO is likely necessary for capital and growth.  While he finds public market participation in value creation appealing, he anticipates the process will be 'annoying.'  The AI giant, valued at potentially $1 trillion, is reportedly preparing for a 2026 or 2027 listing.

title: 'A perfect blueprint': Xi is watching — will China do a Venezuela on Taiwan?
content: In a dramatic shift that overturns post-Cold War expectations, the United States has taken the extraordinary step of capturing Venezuela's president and asserting its control over the nation. This provocative act ignites concerns in Asia, as observers wonder if Xi Jinping could seize the moment to challenge Taiwan, thereby probing the boundaries of what international law allows for powerful nations.

title: Trump flips Monroe into Donroe: How US plans to reshape the Western Hemisphere — explained
content: US President Donald Trump has revived and expanded the Monroe Doctrine, now dubbed the "Donroe Doctrine," to assert American dominance across the Western Hemisphere. This aggressive approach has led to military action in Venezuela, threats against Cuba and Colombia, and ambitions for Greenland, signaling a significant shift in US foreign policy.

title: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken by Travis Kelce’s confession ahead of wedding
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been dealing with a lot on their plate ever since they announced their engagement last year. While the two have kept themselves busy with planning their wedding, it seems Taylor Swift is deeply unsettled by some of Travis Kelce's words that he has said in public about his past. It seems this has become a huge deal for Taylor Swift ahead of their wedding.

title: Vanessa Bryant says friends pushed her forward long after Kobe’s Lakers legacy
content: Vanessa Bryant, widow of NBA legend Kobe Bryant, continues to champion the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation. Recently, she shared a striking photo, crediting her friends for encouraging her to be more present in pictures.  She also celebrated Taylor Swift wearing Kobe Bryant merchandise, a gesture her daughters, avid Swifties, would appreciate.

title: Matthew Mercer steps back from Critical Role livestream amid burnout reflection
content: Matthew Mercer has stepped back from leading Critical Role’s “Dungeons and Dragons” livestream after opening up about burnout and creative exhaustion. While he remains involved in major projects like animated series and game publishing, Brennan Lee Mulligan now serves as game master for Campaign Four. Mercer says taking time away is essential for long-term creativity, balance, and renewed inspiration.

title: Mustafizur row: What 'hurt' Bangladesh said while banning IPL broadcast
content: The ban came a day after Bangladesh decided not to travel to India for next month’s T20 World Cup and asked the International Cricket Council (ICC) to move all of its group matches to Sri Lanka, the tournament’s co-host.

title: Uttarakhand: Govt mulls ban on non-Hindus at Haridwar ghats; seers push demand
content: Uttarakhand government is considering a ban on non-Hindus entering Haridwar's 105 ghats, potentially restoring a 1916 agreement. The state also plans to declare Haridwar and Rishikesh as 'holy cities'. This move follows demands from some religious leaders, though opposition exists among residents and former Ganga Sabha officials.

title: ‘Silent spectator for decades’: SC raps Uttarakhand over forest encroachment
content: The Supreme Court has strongly criticized the Uttarakhand government for its two-decade inaction against widespread forest land encroachment in Rishikesh.  The court suspects a deep-rooted nexus between officials and illegal occupants, demanding a detailed affidavit on the extent of the problem and responsible officers.  Recent drives have recovered some land, but the court seeks comprehensive accountability.

title: 'Don't think about … ': Ponting sends big message to out-of-form Surya
content: Ricky Ponting backs India's Suryakumar Yadav for the T20 World Cup. He praises Axar Patel's selection as vice-captain. Ponting is surprised by Shubman Gill's exclusion from the squad. This highlights India's strong player depth. Ponting believes in trusting natural game and backing instincts for success.

title: 'Dhurandhar' box office collection day 32: Ranveer Singh starrer sees first big drop
content: Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna's 'Dhurandhar' experienced its first notable slowdown after a remarkable five-week run, with collections dipping to single digits on its fifth Monday. Despite this, the spy thriller achieved a record-breaking fifth weekend and surpassed Rs 900 crore gross domestically. Its worldwide total now stands at an impressive Rs 1212 crore.

title: $20,000 instead of Rs 20K: Bank clerk’s typo leaves Kerala Univ poorer by Rs 16 lakh
content: A costly bank error at Kerala University's Centre for Latin American Studies resulted in a Rs 16.5 lakh loss. A typo swapped '₹' for '$' during a payment to a guest lecturer's wife, sending $20,000 instead of Rs 20,000. Efforts to recover the excess funds have failed, with the lecturer passing away before repayment.

title: 'Culprit is not her ex-boyfriend': Hyd woman working in US murdered; suspect flees to India
content: A 27-year-old Indian woman, Nikitha Godishala, was found murdered in Maryland, USA. Police are searching for Arjun Sharma, who allegedly fled to India after borrowing money from Nikitha. Her father clarified Sharma was not her ex-boyfriend but a former housemate. The incident has deeply impacted the Indian community.

title: Andhra Pradesh attempting to steal Godavari water: Telangana
content: Telangana has moved the Supreme Court, accusing Andhra Pradesh of attempting to misappropriate its share of Godavari water through the Polavaram-Nallamala Sagar Project. AP, however, argues the project utilizes excess floodwater and has Telangana's prior consent, calling the opposition an attempt to stall farmer-friendly initiatives.

title: 'Ikkis' box office collection day 5: Agastya Nanda starrer struggles on first Monday
content: In its fifth day of release, Agastya Nanda's inaugural film 'Ikkis', a stirring biopic about Arun Khetarpal, has encountered a stark decline at the box office, raking in only Rs 1.35 crore. Being the only major release has not shielded it from disappointing results, with an overall collection of THIS amount.

title: Andrew McCutchen & Maria Hanslovan net worth: MLB earnings, deals and assets
content: Andrew McCutchen's stellar MLB career, marked by five All-Star selections and an MVP award, has been the bedrock of his substantial finances, amassing over $131 million from contracts. His wife, Maria Hanslovan, contributes significantly through her thriving fitness and wellness career. Together, their combined net worth is estimated between $60-$65 million, bolstered by endorsements and joint assets.

title: 'Will bolster India's self-confidence': Rajnath commissions pollution control vessel 'Samudra Pratap'
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh commissioned the Indian Coast Guard's first indigenously designed pollution control vessel, 'Samudra Pratap', in Goa. This 114.5-meter ship, built by Goa Shipyard Limited with over 60% indigenous content, significantly bolsters India's maritime safety and self-reliance.

title: Smoke trap: Bengaluru techie dies in fire accident at her home
content: A 34-year-old software engineer, Sharmila Kushalappa, died under suspicious circumstances in a fire at her Bengaluru residence on January 3. Police suspect suffocation from smoke inhalation. The apartment was locked from the inside, and she was found unconscious near the kitchen.

title: 'Anti-Sikh remarks': Akal Takht summons Punjab CM; Mann to appear on Jan 15
content: Akal Takht has summoned Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann to appear on January 15 over alleged "anti-Sikh remarks" and a controversial video. Mann has pledged to obey the summons with reverence, stating the Takht is supreme. The Jathedar cited Mann's alleged "patit" status as the reason for summoning him to the secretariat, not the facade.

title: Erik Karlsson luxury watch collection: Inside his Rolex choices and style
content: Erik Karlsson, the Pittsburgh Penguins defenseman, is a man with not only the finest NHL competency but also the best watch collection. One of the most favorite models in his collection is the Rolex Submariner "Kermit", which is a superb gift to his fans and collectors. Karlsson has a sense of taste in watches, which portrays his luxury that both performs on the ice and is an elegant timepiece.

title: Fans accuse Cardi B of crossing a line after deleted tweet amid Diggs claims
content: Rapper Cardi B's attempt to defend NFL player Stefon Diggs has sparked controversy. Her public messages, seemingly directed at Diggs' former chef, have drawn criticism online. Fans believe Cardi B crossed a line by engaging with the alleged victim during an active legal case. The deleted tweet has fueled debate about celebrity influence and the timing of such public statements.

title: Cold wave tightens grip on Himachal Pradesh, fresh snowfall reported in higher areas
content: Himachal Pradesh witnessed a fresh snowfall in higher reaches, while severe cold wave conditions with dense fog and ground frost were reported across the region. Minimum temperatures, reportedly, plummeted, with Tabo recording the coldest at minus 10.2 degrees Celsius. A travel advisory has also been issued for Lahaul-Spiti due to sustained winter severity.

title: Defender, BMW Z4 seized: ED raids 'face of fantasy cricket' Anurag Dwivedi
content: Enforcement Directorate conducted fresh searches on social media influencer Anurag Dwivedi's properties in a money laundering probe linked to illegal online betting. Authorities seized luxury vehicles and froze assets worth ₹3 crore. Dwivedi, reportedly in Dubai, is accused of promoting betting platforms and using hawala channels for illicit funds, including real estate investments abroad.

title: Kevin Durant vs LeBron James net worth: NBA earnings, contracts and endorsements
content: NBA titans Kevin Durant and LeBron James, despite playing for different teams, share a strong bond. Durant, with a net worth of $300 million, earns significantly from his NBA salary and brand deals. James, a Lakers legend, boasts an impressive $1.2 billion net worth, largely driven by lucrative endorsements and his NBA contract.

title: 'Will take up arms': Colombia prez unfazed by Trump's threats; what ex-guerrilla fighter said
content: Colombian President Gustavo Petro declared he would "take up arms" after US President Donald Trump threatened military action and accused him of drug trafficking. Petro defended Colombia's anti-narcotics strategy, warning that excessive force could lead to civilian casualties and a surge in guerrilla activity. The exchange follows a US operation in Venezuela that captured President Maduro.

title: Grant Hackett & Sharlene Fletcher net worth: Swimming legacy and lifestyle
content: Grant Hackett, a decorated Australian swimmer, has successfully transitioned his athletic earnings and sponsorships into a substantial net worth of $7-$12 million AUD. Alongside his wife Sharlene Fletcher, who manages their family life, the couple maintains a stable financial standing through Hackett's post-swimming business ventures and investments, reflecting a grounded approach to wealth.

title: Quote of the day by William Shakespeare: 'Love all, trust a few…'
content: William Shakespeare, the 'Bard of Avon,' born in 1564, remains an unparalleled literary giant. He stands no match in any writer till date. No one has been able to replace William Shakespeare. His prolific career yielded 39 plays, 154 sonnets, and narrative poems, profoundly shaping the English language with over 1,700 invented words. His works, from comedies like 'A Midsummer Night's Dream' to tragedies like 'Hamlet,' continue to resonate globally, influencing psychology and literature.

title: Aluminium foil use for food: Doctor explains when to be cautious
content: Studies reveal that aluminum foil can leach unsafe levels of metals into food, particularly with acidic, salty, or spicy items cooked at high temperatures. This excess aluminum intake over time may contribute to bone problems, kidney strain, and nerve-related issues. Experts advise using steel, glass, or ceramic containers for storage and avoiding direct contact between foil and certain foods.

title: Hindu widow raped, tortured in Bangladesh: Accused tie her to tree, cut hair; 2 held
content: A Hindu widow in Bangladesh was brutally tortured, raped, and had her hair cut by a local man who had made repeated indecent advances. The 40-year-old victim was attacked after rejecting the advances of a man from whom she had purchased property. Two men have been arrested following her complaint.

title: Oil, Election And In-Charge: Trump Reveals His Plan For Venezuela's Future
content: US President Donald Trump said the United States is not at war with Venezuela and will not push for elections there in the near term. days after US forces captured the now-deposed president, Nicolas Maduro, in a military raid.

title: Father Of Woman Found Dead In US Seeks Centre's Help To Bring Back Her Body
content: The father of Nikitha Godishala, who was found dead in the US, here on Monday, called for tough punishment for the person responsible for his daughter's death.

title: Hindu Man Killed In Bangladesh, 2nd Such Incident In 24 Hours
content: A Hindu man working as a grocery store owner has allegedly been killed in Bangladesh, in what is a second such incident in the last 24 hours.

title: Shots Fired Near Venezuela Presidential Palace Hours After Delcy Rodriquez Sworn In
content: Unidentified drones flew over the Miraflores palace in central Caracas and security forces opened fire in response around 8 pm, the source said, hours after Maduro's deputy Delcy Rodriguez was sworn in as interim president following his removal.

title: 6.2 Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Western Japan
content: An earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 6.2 hit the western Chugoku region of Japan on Tuesday, the Japan Meteorological Agency said, followed by a series of sizeable aftershocks.

title: Who Is Alvin Hellerstein, 92-Year-Old Judge Hearing Maduro's Case In New York
content: Alvin Hellerstein, the 92-year-old US judge handling the case against deposed Venezuelan leader Nicolas Maduro, has presided over a number of notable trials during his decades on the bench.

title: Netanyahu Says Israel Won't Let Iran Restore Ballistic Missile Programme
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Monday that Israel would not allow arch-foe Iran to restore its ballistic missile programme, just days after US President Donald Trump issued a similar threat.

title: UP Man Kills Father, Sister, Niece Over Land Dispute, Dumps Bodies In Well: Cops
content: A man allegedly killed his father, sister, and niece with an axe over a land dispute and threw their bodies into a well in a village in Ganga Nagar area here, police said on Monday.

title: Mob Behind 2020 JNU Attack Still Unknown; Faculty Body Slams Delhi Police
content: Jawaharlal Nehru University Teachers' Association (JNUTA) on Monday recalled the "barbarous assault" on students and faculty six years ago on this day on the varsity campus.

title: Invasive "Alien" Fish Spreads In Pakistani Waters, Threatens Biodiversity
content: WWF-Pakistan has cautioned that an invasive fish species has been detected in water bodies across Sindh and Lower Punjab, warning that its spread poses a serious threat to aquatic biodiversity and the fisheries economy, Geo TV.

title: Court Issues Summons To Shilpa Shetty's Husband Raj Kundra in Bitcoin Scam
content: A special PMLA court here on Monday issued summons to businessman Raj Kundra in the Bitcoin scam case after taking cognizance of the chargesheet filed against him by the Enforcement Directorate (ED).

title: 18-Year-Old Killed In Delhi Stabbing, Another Injured: Police
content: An 18-year-old man was killed and another seriously injured after a stabbing incident in northeast Delhi's Welcome area, police said on Tuesday.

title: "That's Enough Now": Denmark Warns US Against Taking Greenland By Force
content: Denmark's prime minister warned Monday that any US move to take Greenland by force would destroy 80 years of transatlantic security links, after President Donald Trump repeated his desire to annex the mineral-rich Arctic territory.

title: Only 33% Of Americans Approve Of US Strike On Venezuela: Polls
content: One in three Americans approve of the US military strike on Venezuela that toppled the country's president and 72% worry the US will become too involved in the South American country, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll that concluded on Monday.

title: Elon Musk's Grok Faces Global Backlash Over Sexualised Images
content: Elon Musk's AI tool Grok faced growing international backlash Monday for generating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors, with the European Union joining the condemnation and Britain warning of an investigation.

title: After Venezuela, Here Are Trump's 5 Next Potential Targets
content: An emboldened US President Donald Trump has hinted that he has other countries in his sights after toppling Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro, leaving the world asking: where's next?

title: Jamaat Alleges Unfair Election Conditions In Bangladesh
content: Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami on Monday said that the conditions for a free, fair, and impartial election have "not yet been established in the country," and accused the government of showing bias toward a particular political party, Dhaka Tribune repor

title: US Attacks Venezuela LIVE: Delcy Rodríguez Sworn In As Venezuela’s Interim President Amid Maduro Trial
content: US-Venezuela Conflict Live News: Venezuela has warned that recent US military action against Caracas could set a dangerous global precedent, with the country's defence minister cautioning that such moves threaten the international order.

title: Delcy Rodriguez Sworn In As Venezuela's Interim President Amid Maduro Trial
content: Venezuela's vice president and oil minister Delcy Rodriguez was formally sworn in on Monday as the country's interim president, as US-deposed President Nicolas Maduro appeared in a New York court on drug charges.

title: US Raided Venezuela After Maduro's "One Dance Too Many": Report
content: Footage broadcast on Venezuelan state television in late November showed Maduro bouncing to an electronic beat during a rally.

title: 'Crazy person': Vance's first reaction after attack on home; where was Veep?
content: US Vice President JD Vance's Cincinnati home was attacked overnight, with several windows smashed. Secret Service and Cincinnati police responded swiftly, taking a suspect into custody. Vance, who was in Washington D.C. at the time, expressed gratitude for the quick response and requested media discretion regarding images of the damage.

title: Men's boxers to watch in 2026: Ryan Garcia, Jake Paul, others
content: five fighters could break through in 2026 and make a run at the top of their respective divisions . in 2025, he lost to Rolando "Rolly" Romero in may and was expelled from the WBC in July for repeatedly using racial slurs . the door is opening for a new generation to emerge .

title: NFL futures: Seahawks enter playoffs as Super Bowl favorites, Rams right behind
content: The top two teams in the NFC West have the best odds to win the Super Bowl heading into the playoffs. The  Seattle Seahawks  are the favorites to win Super Bowl 60, following closely by the division rival  Los Angeles Rams . The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl as the top overall seed in the AFC. They, like the Seahawks, will have a bye in the first round. Here are the Super Bowl odds and conference championship odds for every team still in the hunt. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: 2026 Unrivaled megapreview: Rosters, rankings, rules, how to watch
content: 54 of the league's top players are in Miami as the second season of unrivaled tips off . the 3-on-3 league was created to give players a domestic offseason playing opportunity . each member of this season's championship team will win an additional $100,000 .

title: How Cowboys wasted one of Dak Prescott's best seasons
content: dak Prescott had surgery for a right hamstring avulsion that ended his 2024 season . it was the third time in five seasons he had missed significant time because of injury . he threw for more than 4,000 yards and had at least 30 touchdown passes .

title: 'It's pretty emotional': Rodgers' take on returning to playoffs tops Week 18 quotes
content: the Pittsburgh Steelers host the Baltimore Ravens in a win-or-go-home showdown . players and coaches carried the intensity from the field to the podium . here are some of the best quotes from around the NFL in Week 18 .

title: Detroit bakery serves up life-sized cake of Lions stars
content: the viral "Spider-Man + Superman" celebration has taken on a life of its own . amon-Ra St. Brown flies over a crouching Gibbs after his 78-yard touchdown run . the home bakery in Rochester, Michigan, recreated another life-size cake .

title: Early wild card bets: How to bet Packers-Bears, Bills-Jaguars
content: the playoffs kick off with the Los Angeles Rams at the Carolina Panthers, followed by the Green Bay Packers at Chicago Bears . on Sunday, the red-hot Houston Texans hit the road to face the Pittsburgh Steelers .

title: Women's AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
content: the new AP Top 25 women's college basketball poll is out . the first rankings of 2026 came with plenty of change after the LSU Tigers , Maryland Terrapins and Iowa State Cyclones all lost . ranked no. 5, 6, 7, 8 and 10 from the previous poll all lost in the last four days .

title: Offseason guide for eliminated NFL teams
content: the 2026 offseason has begun for the 18 teams that did not make the postseason . we have next steps for all 18 franchises . what big decisions are on deck for each front office? we have a big offseason prediction for every eliminated team .

title: Ranking the best QBs in the transfer portal
content: ESPN's rankings of the top quarterbacks in the transfer portal . the most coveted passers on the board are quickly locking in decisions on their next stop . a year later, it's Indiana, Oregon, Ole Miss and Miami in the college football playoff semifinals .

title: College football transfer portal: Tracking who's on the move
content: Max Olson ranks Cincinnati's Brendan Sorsby as the top player in the transfer portal and predicts a recruitment battle between Texas Tech and LSU. (1:04) College football's transfer portal officially opened at midnight ET on Jan. 2. However, players have been announcing their intentions to transfer since the regular season ended. By midday on Day 1, more than 4,500 Division I college football players have entered the transfer portal. Players now have until Jan. 16 to enter their name to transfer. It doesn't mean they have to find their new schools by then -- or that they can't return to their previous schools. We are tracking the notable players entering the portal as well as those players who will re-sign with their current schools. Here's the latest news and updates on how the 2026 season could be transformed.

title: Pistons, Knicks and big questions along the race for the East's top seed
content: the new york Knicks and Detroit Pistons face off as the top two seeds in the Eastern Conference . the two teams have ramped-up expectations for the first time since the series . they are the newly crowned NBA Cup champions, led by the steady Brunson .

title: What does Pete Carroll's exit mean for the Raiders, Geno Smith?
content: Pete Carroll led the Raiders to a 3-14 record -- his worst as a coach . the 74-year-old was fired on monday with 17 games into his three-year deal . he was "blindly optimistic" about the talent on the roster .
